column1: This postgraduate fashion degree explores concepts and contemporary topics in design, fashion and textiles.OverviewThe course will give you an in-depth understanding of business processes and functions within the industry’s creative foundations. It attracts people from business and textile backgrounds – offering the chance to carry out structured research investigation.
FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
1 year full time, 2 years part time
